de.ityx.contex.data.match

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.data.match.Column
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Column
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class represents a query term within a Request object.
    In addition to column name and value there are several attributes.
    • identifying - if true this columns value must occur in the result data record
    • distance - the maximum edit distance of this columns value to the result's data record value
    • weight - the weight of this columns error in relation to the total error of the result
    • mode - the query mode for this column. Default is CANDIDATES_FUZZY.
    See Also:
    IFuzzyMatcherEngine}, Serialized Form

      String value,
      boolean identifying,
      int distance)
        Create a new Column with given name and value.
        Query mode is default IFuzzyMatcherEngine.CANDIDATES_FUZZY.
        Parameters:
        name - - this columns name
        value - - this columns value
        identifying - - specifies if this columns value must occur in the result data record or not
        distance - - the max edit distance for this value

      String value,
      boolean identifying,
      int distance,
      int mode)
        Create a new Column with given name and value.
        Parameters:
        name - - this columns name
        value - - this columns value
        identifying - - specifies if this columns value must occur in the result data record or not
        distance - - the max edit distance for this value
        mode - - the query mode this column is looked up in fuzzy index

        IFuzzyMatcherEngine
